channel.title: Architect on Secret Chipmunk
channel.description: Recent content in Architect on Secret Chipmunk

item.title: Order of Things
item.description: Sequence Diagrams I am not a huge fan of traditional UML diagrams for long term documentation. Most diagrams are quickly rendered old and useless. There are times though when you need to convey the sequence of operations between several entities. It is hard to beat the Sequence Diagram for those situations. There are plenty of tools that let you build some very sophisticated Sequence Diagrams. I try to avoid spending more time building a Sequence Diagram than it would take to write the code behind the diagram.
